NIDA_77.Description:
LEVEL OF RISK ASSOCIATED WITH DIFFERENT SUBSTANCE INVOLVEMENT SCORE RANGES FOR ILLICIT OR NON-MEDICAL PRESCRIPTION DRUG USE

0-3 LOWER RISK
4-26 MODERATE RISK
27+ HIGH RISK | Calculation = [NIDA_06]+[NIDA_07]+[NIDA_08]+[NIDA_09]+[NIDA_10]+[NIDA_11]
